data.body: In Foolery UI, selecting the foolery repo shows 'no beads found' even though beads exist. Reproduce, identify root cause in filtering/repo selection/query wiring, and fix.
data.description: In Foolery UI, selecting the foolery repo shows 'no beads found' even though beads exist. Reproduce, identify root cause in filtering/repo selection/query wiring, and fix.
data.title: Investigate false 'no beads found' in repo view
